【Blended and Combined】Matte and eye shadows, long lasting, easily blendable eye shadows that can be applied wet or dry for many different looks. Reasonably clever color combinations, make the eyes more vivid, rich three-dimensional sense
【Convenient】Highly pigmented pressed powder eye shadows palette, great for exploring colors and makeup artistry. Suit for different occasions, like casual, salon, party, wedding, etc

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Elevate Your Gaze: Create captivating eyes with our pigmentation-packed eyeshadow palette. Experience stunning color payoff that lasts, enhancing your natural beauty. Ignite your confidence! Versatile Collection: Dive into a world of possibilities with a spectrum of matte and shimmer shades. Easily transition from day to night looks with high-quality, easy-to-blend colors that suit every occasion. True-to-You Hues: Embrace authentic shades that stay true to their color, ensuring your look matches your expectations. Say goodbye to fading and smudging - our shadows stand the test of time. Flawless Application: Achieve professional results with our cruelty-free formula. Enjoy smooth, effortless blending and high impact, buildable pigments. Perfect for makeup enthusiasts of all skill levels. Unveil Your Style: Unleash your creativity and experiment with endless eye-catching combinations. Our palette comes with a brush and mirror for a comprehensive makeup experience.

Elevate your eye game with our Vibrant Eyeshadow Palette! Unleash your inner artist and create mesmerizing looks that turn heads. This palette is a haven of pigmentation, featuring a versatile collection of matte and shimmer shades that cater to your every mood and occasion. Whether you're aiming for a natural daytime look or a sultry evening ensemble, our eyeshadows deliver vibrant, true-to-color results that won't fade away.Designed to cater to makeup enthusiasts of all levels, our blendable formula ensures smooth application and effortless blending. Say goodbye to creasing and smudging – our eyeshadows are here to stay, lasting from dawn to dusk. We prioritize quality and authenticity, so the hues you see in the palette match the hues you'll see on your eyes.Unveil your unique style, experiment with colors, and embrace your individuality. Our cruelty-free formula respects your skin and delivers professional results without harming animals. With the brush set included and makeup mirror, achieving your dream eye look has never been this easy.Ignite your confidence, enhance your natural beauty, and embrace a world of possibilities with our Vibrant Eyeshadow Palette. Elevate your gaze and seize the spotlight – because you deserve to shine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice product, excellent price
reviews.reviewText: I love an eye shadow that stays put, and this one does. Nice selection of colors. I don't usually use the brush that comes with a pallet but this one is actually quite nice. Very happy and will order again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable, beautiful colors, perfect for smokey looks
reviews.reviewText: I love it. So glad I found it. Perfect colors for my smokey eye look. Just what I needed. I compared this to other palettes from other sellers before buying and so glad I decided to give it a try. No need for any $70 smokey palette which is an insane price but not uncommon now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great quality but not colors i expected. These are not pink palettes.
reviews.reviewText: The color is vibrant for both matte and shimmer and lasts all day. I have sensitive eyes and skin and this product causes no bad reaction for me. Easy to apply and blend and stays in place. Im impressed with quality! Just one thing...I was hoping for more pink tones, not sure what happened there but i got more bronze/gold/yellow /brown tones and i thought i ordered or saw more pink tones in the pics before ordering so im a bit bummed i didn't get the color palettes i thought i was getting. I ordered 2 seperate pallettes, shimmer and matte both seemed to have pink colors.. But they do not. Only one matte dark peach color and 1 shimmery dark pink.. No complaints on quality though. So if you are seeking pink palettes these are not pink. Ill most likely not use most of the colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a product that would give me options and boy did I get it. It's all I needed for makeup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars These are all red-based colors
reviews.reviewText: I was frustrated that I felt like all of the colors looked similar on my eyelids. They all have reddish tint to them. This is not my color and I was hoping for some cool browns and natural colors. I would only recommend these for someone who prefers reddish, warm makeup tones. I ended up using colors I already had and will probably give these away.It seemed like a good value for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to blend
reviews.reviewText: Love the colors in this set. It comes with colors that I would have never used but when applied it looks good. The colors are neutral and can be used for every day wear. I love that the colors blend well and apply so smoothly

reviews.reviewerName: This product tastes amazing! Im so excited to put it on my iced coffees at home!
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The colors are perfect and came packaged perfect
reviews.reviewText: They love the colors and I love how it was vacuums sealed and perfect colors too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Package was protecting product very nicely. She loves the ease of use.
good value, great color selection, stays on all day....
Se travaille plutôt bien, peu de couleur claires ou de transition, peu pigmenté.Bien pour un effet soft-glam
Le encanto a mi esposa, llegaron en muy buenas condiciones y en el tiempo indicado...
The eyeshadow package has different colors so you can match it to your mood.

Llegaron muchísimo antes de lo esperado. Estaban muy bien empaquetadas y el rastreo fue muy sencillo. Las sombras llegaron sin ningún quiebre, ya solo falta ponerlas a prueba. La pigmentación a simple tacto, no es tan mala.
